casebody.data:
Michelle LOMET, Petitioner-Petitioner,
and
Dennis Lomet, Sr., Petitioner,
v.
LAWES COAL COMPANY, Respondent-Respondent. C-453 September Term 2018
081690 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 18, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001169-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
